|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | **Step 1: Setup your project**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | 1.1 Open VSCode and create a new folder for your project. Let's call it `my_package`.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | 1.2 Inside this folder, create 3 files:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | - `__init__.py`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | - `get_data.py`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | - `setup.py`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | Your project structure will look like this:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | my_package/                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |     __init__.py                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |     get_data.py                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |     setup.py                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | **Step 2: Add your script to `get_data.py`**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | 2.1 Open the `get_data.py` file and add your script. You've already provided your Python script, so paste it there.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | **Step 3: Add import statement to `__init__.py`**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | 3.1 Open the `__init__.py` file and add the following line:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | ```python                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | from .get_data import get_data                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | **Step 4: Add package information to `setup.py`**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | 4.1 Open the `setup.py` file and add the following code:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | ```python                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | from setuptools import setup, find_packages                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | setup(                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |     name="my_package",                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |     version="0.1",                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |     description="A package to get data from planx.hlag.com",                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |     author="Your Name",                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |     packages=find_packages(),                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |     install_requires=[                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |         'requests',                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |         'pandas',                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |     ],                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | )                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | Please replace "Your Name" with your actual name.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | **Step 5: Create a distribution package**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | 5.1 Open a terminal in VSCode (View -> Terminal).                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | 5.2 Navigate to the directory containing your `setup.py` file. In the terminal, type:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | ```bash                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | cd /path_to_your_folder/my_package                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | Please replace `/path_to_your_folder/` with your actual path.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | 5.3 Run the following command in the terminal:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | ```bash                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | python setup.py sdist                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | This will create a source distribution of your package. You'll find it in a newly created `dist/` directory.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | **Step 6: Install and use the package in a new Python environment**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | 6.1 Now you can send this file (ends with `.tar.gz`) to the other computer. It should be named like `my_package-0.1.tar.gz`.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | 6.2 Install Python on the other computer if it's not already installed.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | 6.3 Install the package using pip. Open a terminal (or command prompt in Windows), navigate to the directory containing the `my_package-0.1.tar.gz` file and type:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | ```bash                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | pip install my_package-0.1.tar.gz                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | 6.4 Now you can import the package in a Python script or a Jupyter notebook and use its functions:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | ```python                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | import my_package                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | df = my_package.get_data()                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | Remember to have the Jupyter notebook installed on the other machine, you can install it using pip:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | ```bash                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | pip install jupyter                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | Then you can start it from the terminal by typing:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | ```bash                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | jupyter notebook                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | It will open in your default web browser.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | **Important Notes:**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | - You need to have `setuptools` and `wheel` installed in your Python environment to create the distribution. You can install them using `pip install setuptools wheel`.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | - The `requests` and `pandas` packages must be installed in the Python environment where you are going to use your package.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | - Be careful not to expose your tokens and other sensitive information when sharing your package, especially if it's going to be public.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | - Python, pip, setuptools, and wheel versions can sometimes cause issues when packaging. Make sure all these tools are updated to their latest versions.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | - If the other machine doesn't have internet access, you need to also provide the `.whl` files of your dependencies (`requests` and `pandas`). You can download these files from PyPI, the Python Package Index.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
