|     |                                      |               |               | 1. **API / Proxy Server**: Your Python script sends a request to an API endpoint (a server you control). This server knows the database credentials and can query the database. The server performs the necessary query and sends the result back to the Python script.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | Here's a basic illustration of the Python client script:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | ```python                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | import requests                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | # Define the parameters of your query                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | params = {"query": "SELECT * FROM my_table"}                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | # Send a request to the API                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | response = requests.get("https://myapi.com/query", params=params)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | # Print the response                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | print(response.json())                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | On the server side (the API), you'd have code like this, which should be running in a secure environment:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | ```python                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | from flask import Flask, request                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | from sqlalchemy import create_engine                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | import pandas as pd                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | app = Flask(__name__)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | # Establish DB connection                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | engine = create_engine('mysql+pymysql://username:password@localhost/db_name')                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | @app.route('/query')                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | def query_db():                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |     query = request.args.get('query')                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |     result = pd.read_sql_query(query, engine)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |     return result.to_json(orient='records')                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | In this scenario, the person running the Python script does not need to know the database credentials. They're only interacting with the API you've set up, and this API is the only entity interacting directly with the database.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | However, this approach does come with its own security considerations. You'll need to make sure that your API is secure, that it can only be accessed by authorized users, and that it won't execute malicious or damaging queries against your database.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | Moreover, it is crucial to understand that this is just a very basic illustration and in a real-world application, several other factors like error handling, data validation, and appropriate sanitization to prevent SQL injection attacks, and setting proper permissions and restrictions on the server-side should be considered.                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | Alternatively, you may consider setting up a service account with limited privileges specifically for this use case. Service accounts are typically used for system-to-system interactions, and their credentials can be managed separately from user credentials. In this case, you will still need to share the service account credentials with the other person, but you can control what data and operations the service account has access to.                                                                                  |                       |                                      |

|     |                                      |               |               | To follow along with this, you need:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |

Python installed (3.6+)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |

Flask library installed (`pip install flask`)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |

|     |                                      |               |               | Now, let's create a basic Flask server that will communicate with your database and execute queries on behalf of your users.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |

Create a new Python script, `app.py`, and open it in your text editor.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | 2. Import the necessary libraries at the top of the script.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | ```python                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | from flask import Flask, request                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | from sqlalchemy import create_engine                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | import pandas as pd                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | 3. Create an instance of the Flask class, and establish a connection to your database.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | ```python                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | app = Flask(__name__)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | engine = create_engine('mysql+pymysql://username:password@localhost/db_name')                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |

|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | 4. Create a route that will handle GET requests to the `/query` endpoint. This route will read the SQL query from the query parameters, execute it against your database, and return the results as JSON.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | ```python                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | @app.route('/query', methods=['GET'])                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                       |                                      |

|     |                                      |               |               | ```python                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |

|     |                                      |               |               | ```python                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |

|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |

|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | if __name__ == '__main__':                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |

|     |                                      |               |               | **Warning:** This is a very basic example and should not be used as-is in a production environment. This script does not authenticate users, it does not check the validity of the incoming SQL query, and it does not handle errors that may occur during the execution of the query. These are all important aspects to consider when developing a real-world application.                                                                                                                                                          |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | On the client side, you can use the `requests` library to send GET requests to the `/query` endpoint of your Flask server. Here's a basic example:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | ```python                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | import requests                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | params = {"query": "SELECT * FROM my_table"}                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                       |                                      |

|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | print(response.json())                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | Replace `"SELECT * FROM my_table"` with the actual SQL query you want to execute, and replace `"http://localhost:5000/query"` with the actual URL of your Flask server.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | Again, this is a very simple example and there are many ways you could extend this, for example by adding authentication to your API, by checking the validity of the incoming SQL queries, by setting up HTTPS for your server, and so on. I would recommend looking into Flask's extensive documentation to learn more about these topics.                                                                                                                                                                                          |                       |                                      |

|     |                                      |               |               | In this example, we have an `/oauth/token` endpoint that clients can use to get an access token. It checks the username and password, and if they're correct, it issues a token.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | The `/query` endpoint is protected by the `@oauth.require_oauth()` decorator. This means that it requires a valid access token to be included in the `Authorization` header of the request.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | Please replace the `verify_password` function with your own authentication logic. In this example, it simply checks if the username and password are correct, but in a real-world application, you would probably want to check the credentials against a user database.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | To get a token from the `/oauth/token` endpoint, you can send a POST request with the `grant_type`, `username`, and `password` parameters. For example:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | ```python                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | import requests                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | response = requests.post('http://localhost:5000/oauth/token', data={                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |     'grant_type': 'password',                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |     'username': 'PowerBI_user',                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |     'password': r'PowerBI\User@Hossam@HQ1611',                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | })                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | access_token = response.json()['access_token']                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | Then, to send a request to the `/query` endpoint, include the access token in the `Authorization` header:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | ```python                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | import requests                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | access_token = '...'  # Replace this with your actual access token                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | headers = {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |     'Authorization': 'Bearer {}'.format(access_token),                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                       |                                      |
